SELECT b.id AS id, b.url as url, b.business_name as businessName, (select dictionary_name from sys_dictionary di where di.id=b.business_type and di.`delete`=1 ) as businessType, b.address as address, b.contact_way as contactWay, b.state as state FROM biz_business b
1=1
and b.business_name like '%${businessName}%'
and b.business_type=#{businessType}
and b.`delete`=1 order by b.date_create desc

SELECT b.id AS id, b.url as url, b.business_name as businessName, b.business_type as businessType, b.address as address, b.remark as remark, b.contact_way as contactWay, b.state as state, b.lng as lng, b.lat as lat FROM biz_business b where b.`delete`=1 and b.id=#{id}
